queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.privileged is true

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run/istio-cni' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run/istio-cni' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/opt/cni/bin' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/opt/cni/bin' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run/netns' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run/netns' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/proc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc/cni/net.d' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/cni/net.d' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.volumeMounts.name={{cni-socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.volumeMounts.name={{cni-socket-dir}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/istio-cni' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/istio-cni' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/netns' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/netns' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/cni/net.d' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'istio-cni-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/cni/net.d' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=install-cni has limits defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=install-cni doesn't have limits defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{install-cni}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{install-cni}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{istio-cni-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{install-cni}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
